stanza.line: Can my love excuse the slow (a)offence(/a)
Of my dull bearer when from thee I (b)speed(/b)
From where thou art why should I haste me (a)thence(/a)
Till I return of posting is no (b)need(/b)
O what excuse will my poor beast then (c)find(/c)
When swift extremity can seem but (d)slow(/d)
Then should I spur though mounted on the (c)wind(/c)
In winged speed no motion shall I (d)know(/d)
Then can no horse with my desire keep (e)pace(/e)
Shall neigh (no dull flesh) in his fiery (e)race(/e)
But love for love thus shall excuse my (f)jade(/f)
Since from thee going he went (g)wilful-slow(/g)
Towards thee I'll run and give him leave to (g)go(/g)
